itemLabel

Founded by my friend Mushbuh, itemLabel is a brand making and selling original toys and apparel.

“Heaven shirt” (2022)

In October 2022, itemLabel released “Shirt Capsule 2”—a new line of merch, made in collaboration with various talented artists. The other artists’ contributions can be found in the Twitter announcement.

I had a lot of fun with my design—shown below. I imagined waking up in a meadow of blooming Sucklet flowers, and watching a Bad Guy sun rise over the land… where am I?!

“Heaven shirt” is custom-manufactured, with a high quality 4-colour screenprint on the front. Buy yours here—if it’s still in stock, at least. It isn’t.

If you have one and wanna show it off, send pics to hello@nezu.world~ Or just mention me or itemLabel on Twitter.

Fonts

  • tm-pico-A (unreleased)

Tools
